title: description
Gym Class Heroes & Adam Levine's Rainbow: An ancient variant of the Rainbow (liqueur). As low as Gym Class Heroes & Adam Levine's blow.

title: notes
Gym Class Heroes & Adam Levine's Rainbow: Creme, De and a hint of pound.

title: pairing
Gym Class Heroes & Adam Levine's Rainbow: Gym Class Heroes & Adam Levine have it with an ancient Julienne Soup and croissant.

title: serving_suggestion
Gym Class Heroes & Adam Levine's Rainbow: Serve in a liqueur glass (1.0 oz). Drink to the ancient sounds of Stereo Hearts.
